name: Pocket Home - Harmony Design
description:
Welcome to the world of Pocket Home - Harmony Design game – wide plains, thriving forests and high mountains are waiting for you right now! Here you can act like a real survivor – but without any dangers! Explore the locations, gather useful resources with the help of your true tools, exchange them on the materials and, finally build your house to furnish it as you wish!

Pocket Home - Harmony Design features:
• Safe craft and ‘survival’ game
• Nice tools to craft and gather
• Wood, stones, and leaves as the main resources
• Many unlockable materials
• Chance to build your own house
• Nice furniture to design your home
• Colorful locations made in HQ 3D

Survive without any troubles – become a real architect with Pocket Home - Harmony Design game, gather resources, build houses and furnish them all as you wish!
